metadata.synopsis: Players get a disguise in House of Hope as an attire item: while it's equipped, Eternal Debtors are not hostile towards the character. In Boudoir there's a big chance that one character will be naked (after all the items are unequipped) after an encounter with Incubus, so we place a small warning near the exit if a character is not in disguise

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Better to put the debtor's attire back on. It keeps the locals quiet.
